DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The purpose of this retrospective study is to collect additional safety information of patients with haemophilia and inhibitors who are treated with rFVIIa.
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Safety Surveillance of NovoSevenÂ® in Patients With Haemophilia and Inhibitors by Means of the UK Haemophilia Database
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional, retrospective data collection on standard treatments of haemophilia A and B patients with inhibitors in the UK.
DOC.criteria: All haemophilia A or B patients with inhibitors treated with NovoSeven are included No exclusion criteria beyond the contraindications described in the approved product information text
